scripts.yaml: jq '.[]|select(.chainName=="${NETWORK:-mumbai}")' config/networks.json | npx hbs-cli -i subgraph.yaml_handlebar -e yaml -o thegraph
scripts.build2: npm run yaml && npm run codegen && npm run graph-build
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run yaml && npm run codegen && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-${NETWORK:-mumbai} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $THEGRAPH_KEY
